market_value_definition: Market Value is defined as 'an opinion of the best price at which the sale of an interest in property would have been completed unconditionally for cash consideration on the date of the valuation, assuming (1) a willing seller; (2) that, prior to the date of valuation, there had been a reasonable period (having regard to the nature of the property and the state of the market) for the proper marketing of the interest and for the agreement of the sale price; (3) that, the state of the market, level of values and other circumstances were, on any earlier assumed date of exchange of contracts, the same as on the date of valuation; (4) that no account is taken of any additional bid by a prospective buyer with a special interest; (5) that both parties to the transaction had acted knowledgeably, prudently and without compulsion.'
documents_description: Sale deed, approved plan, electricity bill, identity proof, site photos
valuer_comments:
• The subject property is a residential independent house located in Green Villas, Ameenpur, Sangareddy District.
• Land area as per sale deed and approved plan is 150 sq yd (1,350 sft).
• Built-up area considered for valuation is 3,840 sft (Ground + 2 floors, 1,280 sft each floor).
• Valuation is based on market comparables from recent registered sale deeds in the same gated community and area.
• Amenities include covered car park, modular kitchen, wardrobes, and air conditioner.
• Plot boundaries are demarcated and easily identifiable as per site visit and documentation.
• No area or vertical deviations observed as per approved plan and site.
• No negative features observed in the surroundings; area is clean and well maintained with good road connectivity.
• Property is not within 100m of any protected monument/regulated area.
• Expected future physical life of the property is 55 years based on current construction quality and finishes.
• Title is assumed clear and all necessary permissions are assumed to have been obtained as per standard valuation assumptions.
valuer_declaration: I confirm that the market value for the subject property as on 24-Jun-2025 is INR 17,640,000/- [Seventeen Million Six Hundred Forty Thousand Rupees] taking into consideration the market dynamics and the condition of the property, its location, and amenities available.
disclaimer_text: Please note that the above is a valuation and not a structural survey. CBRE is not responsible to HSBC or the purchaser of the above property for any flaws and/or faults with the property not detected by the above Valuer.
